blocks.name: cnbgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with neighbors (of a vertex in a graph).
blocks.origin: const class cnbgr { NeighbVtx }

blocks.name: diff.cnbgr.s
diff.cnbgr.c
diff.cnbgr.w
df-nbgr
blocks.content: Define the (open) _neighborhood_ resp. the class of all neighbors of a vertex (in a graph), see definition in section I.1 of [Bollobas] p. 3 or definition in section 1.1 of [Diestel] p. 3. The neighborhood/neighbors of a vertex are all (other) vertices which are connected with this vertex by an edge. In contrast to a closed neighborhood, a vertex is not a neighbor of itself. This definition is applicable even for arbitrary hypergraphs. Remark: To distinguish this definition from other definitions for neighborhoods resp. neighbors (e.g., ` nei ` in Topology, see ~ df-nei ), the suffix ` Vtx ` is added to the class constant ` NeighbVtx ` . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 24-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nbgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cnbgr, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cdif(cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s1))), wrex(s3, cfv(cedg, cv(s0)), wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nbgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ NeighbVtx =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà(Vtx ` s0)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà((Vtx ` s0)\ { s1 })| ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà(Edg ` s0), { s1, s2 } ‚äÜ s3)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: nbgrprc0
blocks.content: The set of neighbors is empty if the graph ` G ` or the vertex ` N ` are proper classes. (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2020.)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: nbgrcl
blocks.content: If a class ` X ` has at least one neighbor, this class must be a vertex. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2021.) (Revised by AV, 12-Feb-2022.)

  df-nbgr(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3)

  eqtr4i(csb(hs0, c1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0))), c3, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  csbfv(hs0, c1, cvtx)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cvtx)
}

  mpt2xeldm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cnbgr, c2, universe, (Vtx ` hs0), { hs2 ‚àà((Vtx ` hs0)\ { hs1 })| ‚àÉ(hs3 ‚àà(Edg ` hs0), { hs1, hs2 } ‚äÜ hs3)})
  df-nbgr(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c((Vtx ` hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)

  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[NeighbVtx]c0)= { s0 ‚àà(c1 \ { c0 })| ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, { c0, s0 } ‚äÜ s1)}), d(s1, c3))
  mpi(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[NeighbVtx]c0)= { s0 ‚àà(c1 \ { c0 })| ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, { c0, s0 } ‚äÜ s1)}, NeighbVtx =(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà(Vtx ` hs0)‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà((Vtx ` hs0)\ { hs1 })| ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Edg ` hs0), { hs1, s0 } ‚äÜ s1)}))

  rabeqbidv(s0, ((Vtx ` hs0)\ { hs1 }), (c1 \ { c0 }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c0)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Edg ` hs0), { hs1, s0 } ‚äÜ s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, { c0, s0 } ‚äÜ s1))

blocks.name: dfnbgr2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the neighbors of a vertex breaking up the subset relationship of an unordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfnbgr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cnbgr, c0), crab(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c0)), wrex(s1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

blocks.name: nbgrisvtx
blocks.content: Every neighbor ` N ` of a vertex ` K ` is a vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: nbgrssvtx
blocks.content: The neighbors of a vertex ` K ` in a graph form a subset of all vertices of the graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: nbuhgr
blocks.content: The set of neighbors of a vertex in a hypergraph. This version of ~ nbgrval (with ` N ` being an arbitrary set instead of being a vertex) only holds for classes whose edges are subsets of the set of vertices (hypergraphs!). (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: nbumgr
blocks.content: The set of neighbors of an arbitrary class in a multigraph. (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nbumgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3)))), wcel(c1, c2))
  expcom(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cumgr), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
  nbumgrvtx(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ex(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3)), emptycls, wa(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr)))
  adantr(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  sylbir(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls), wnel(c1, c2))
  df-nel(c1, c2)
  nbgrnvtx0(c1, c2, c0)
  sylibr(wa(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr)), wceq(crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3)), emptycls), wral(s0, c2, wn(wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
  ralrimiv(s0, c2, wa(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr)), wn(wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3)))
  imp(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
  com13(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3)))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, cumgr), wi(wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
  con3d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, cumgr)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, cumgr), wi(wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3), wcel(c1, c2)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  umgrpredgv(c0, c1, cv(s0), c3, c2)
  rabeq0(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cumgr))
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cumgr)
  diff.cumgr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nbumgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà UMGraph ‚Üí(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= { s0 ‚àà c2 | { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 })
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ‚àà UMGraph ‚Üí(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= { s0 ‚àà c2 | { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 }), c1 ‚àà c2)
  expcom(c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= { s0 ‚àà c2 | { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 })
  nbumgrvtx(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ex(¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= { s0 ‚àà c2 | { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 })
  eqtr4d((c0[NeighbVtx]c1), { s0 ‚àà c2 | { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 }, emptycls, (¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚àà UMGraph))
  adantr(¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= ‚àÖ)
  sylbir(¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= ‚àÖ, c1 ‚àâ c2)
  df-nel(c1, c2)
  nbgrnvtx0(c1, c2, c0)
  sylibr((¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚àà UMGraph), { s0 ‚àà c2 | { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 } = ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3))
  ralrimiv(s0, c2, (¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚àà UMGraph), ¬¨ { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3)
  imp(¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ¬¨ { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3))
  com13(¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, s0 ‚àà c2, ¬¨ { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3)
  ex(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, (¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí ¬¨ { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3))
  con3d((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚àà UMGraph), c1 ‚àà c2, { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3)
  adantl(s0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph, ({ c1, s0 } ‚àà c3 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2))
  ex(c0 ‚àà UMGraph, { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà c2)
  simpld((c0 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3), c1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c2)
  umgrpredgv(c0, c1, s0, c3, c2)
  rabeq0(s0, c2, { c1, s0 } ‚àà c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà UMGraph)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cumgr)
  diff.cumgr.s(s0)
}

thm nbgr2vtx1edg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wcel(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cvtx, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cedg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wcel(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  imp(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0))))))
  sylbi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvexi(c0, cvtx, c2)
  hash2prb(hs0, hs1, c0, universe)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))))
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))), wi(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wa(wral(s1, cdif(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cdif(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs1)))))))
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wa(wral(s1, cdif(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cdif(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs1))))))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)), wa(wral(s1, cdif(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cdif(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs1))))
  syl3anbrc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c2, cnbgr, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wrex(hs2, c1, wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))
  ancomd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))

blocks.name: nbuhgr2vtx1edgblem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ nbuhgr2vtx1edgb . This reverse direction of ~ nbgr2vtx1edg only holds for classes whose edges are subsets of the set of vertices, which is the property of hypergraphs. (Contributed by AV, 2-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: nbuhgr2vtx1edgb
blocks.content: If a hypergraph has two vertices, and there is an edge between the vertices, then each vertex is the neighbor of the other vertex. (Contributed by AV, 2-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: nbusgreledg
blocks.content: A class/vertex is a neighbor of another class/vertex in a simple graph iff the vertices are endpoints of an edge. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nbusgreledg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c2)), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c2)), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wcel(cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))))
  eleq2d(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c2), crab(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wcel(cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  nbusgr(hs0, c0, c2, cfv(cvtx, c0), c3)
  3bitr4rd(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wcel(cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3)))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  usgrpredgv(c0, c2, c1, c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3)))
  eleq1i(cpr(c1, c2), c3, cpr(c2, c1))
  prcom(c1, c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wcel(cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3))))
  elrab(hs0, c1, cfv(cvtx, c0), wcel(cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3))
  eleq1d(cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, cpr(c2, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  preq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpr(c2, c1), c3))
}

thm nbusgreledg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]c2)‚Üî { c1, c2 } ‚àà c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]c2), { c1, c2 } ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)| { c2, hs0 } ‚àà c3 })
  eleq2d(c1, (c0[NeighbVtx]c2), { hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)| { c2, hs0 } ‚àà c3 }, c0 ‚àà USGraph)
  nbusgr(hs0, c0, c2, (Vtx ` c0), c3)
  3bitr4rd(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)| { c2, hs0 } ‚àà c3 }, { c1, c2 } ‚àà c3, { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3, (c1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)‚àß { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3))
  pm4.71rd(c0 ‚àà USGraph, { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0))
  ex(c0 ‚àà USGraph, { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0))
  simprd((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3), c1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), c2 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0))
  usgrpredgv(c0, c2, c1, c3, (Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà USGraph, ({ c1, c2 } ‚àà c3 ‚Üî { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3))
  eleq1i({ c1, c2 }, c3, { c2, c1 })
  prcom(c1, c2)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà USGraph, (c1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)| { c2, hs0 } ‚àà c3 } ‚Üî(c1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)‚àß { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3)))
  elrab(hs0, c1, (Vtx ` c0), { c2, hs0 } ‚àà c3, { c2, c1 } ‚àà c3)
  eleq1d({ c2, hs0 }, c3, { c2, c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  preq2(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Vtx ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.w({ c2, c1 } ‚àà c3)

blocks.name: uhgrnbgr0nb
blocks.content: A vertex which is not endpoint of an edge has no neighbor in a hypergraph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 26-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uhgrnbgr0nb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c1, universe))
  expcom(wcel(c1, universe), wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls, crab(hs0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, universe)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c1, universe), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(hs0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  nbuhgr(hs0, s0, c0, c1, universe, cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(crab(hs0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), emptycls), wral(hs0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, universe)), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  expdimp(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  impcom(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))))
  expd(wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cuhgr), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  expcom(wral(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wnel(c1, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1))))), wn(wrex(s0, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))

thm nbgr0vtxlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wn(wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61nii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  com23(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  ex(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls)))
  expcom(wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls, crab(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0)))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0, wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  nbgrval(s0, s1, c1, cfv(cvtx, c0), c0, cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0)), wceq(crab(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), emptycls), wral(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wn(wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0, wral(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wn(wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  rabeq0(s0, cdif(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(c1)), wrex(s1, cfv(cedg, c0), wss(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  a1d(wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))), w0, wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  sylbir(wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls), wnel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  df-nel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  nbgrnvtx0(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  a1d(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), w0, wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), emptycls))
  nbgrprc0(c0, c1)

  ad2antll((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), c1 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0), w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà((Vtx ` c0)\ { c1 }), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(Edg ` c0), { c1, s0 } ‚äÜ s1)))

  xchbinx(wnel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cedg, c1), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cedg, c1), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cedg, c1), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))

  preq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s0))
  neleq12d(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0)), cv(s0), crab(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cedg, c1), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))

blocks.name: nbgrsym

  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))

  eubidv(s0, ((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3)), (s0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)‚àß c3 = { c1, s0 }), ({ s0, c1 } ‚àà c4 ‚àß c3 = { c1, s0 }))
  impbida(((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c3)), (s0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)‚àß c3 = { c1, s0 }), ({ s0, c1 } ‚àà c4 ‚àß c3 = { c1, s0 }))

blocks.name: nbusgredgeu0
blocks.content: For each neighbor of a vertex there is exactly one edge between the vertex and its neighbor in a simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 27-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Feb-2022.)

thm nbusgredgeu0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wreu(s0, c5, wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, crab(s1, c6, wcel(c1, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wreu(s0, c5, wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))), wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wreu(s0, c5, wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))), weu(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), weu(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))), wreu(s0, c6, wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wreu(s0, c6, wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))), wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c3)))

  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c3)))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  eleq2i(c3, c4, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, cnbgr, c3))))
  nbgrsym(c3, c0, c1)
  nbusgredgeu(s0, c0, c1, c3, c6)
  df-reu(s0, c6, wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))
  eubidv(s0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))))
  syl5bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))))
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c3)))

blocks.name: nbfusgrlevtxm2
blocks.content: If there is a vertex which is not a neighbor of another vertex, the number of neighbors of the other vertex is at most the number of vertices of the graph minus 2 in a finite simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 16-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm nbfusgrlevtxm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))), wbr(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
} = {
  breqtrd(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2), cfv(chash, cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))), wbr(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), cle, cfv(chash, cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1)))), wcel(cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1)), universe), wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1))))
  mp1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))), wcel(cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1)), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, cvtx, c0)
  difexg(c2, universe, cpr(c3, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))), wss(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1))), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  simpr3(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  nbgrssvwo2(c3, c0, c1, c2)
  hashss(cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1)), universe, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
  syl13anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cdif(c2, cpr(c3, c1))), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2)), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c3, c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wcel(c2, cfn))
  fusgrvtxfi(c0, c2)
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))))
  simpr2(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  hashdifpr(c2, c3, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àâ(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)))‚Üí(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))[‚â§]((# ` c2)[-]2))

  simpr3((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚â† c1, c3 ‚àâ(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))

blocks.name: nbusgrvtxm1
blocks.content: If the number of neighbors of a vertex in a finite simple graph is the number of vertices of the graph minus 1, each vertex except the first mentioned vertex is a neighbor of this vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 16-Dec-2020.)

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))

  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wi(wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  2a1d(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wi(wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))))
  ax-1(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)))
  ex(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wi(wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))))
  com23(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))

  syl13anc(wa(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1))), wbr(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simprl(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1))
  adantl(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wne(c3, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1))
  adantr(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1)), wnel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)))

  adantl(wa(wa(wn(wcel(c3, co(c0, cnbgr, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wb(wbr(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2)), wbr(co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2))))

  syl(wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn0), wn(wbr(co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2))), wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cr))
  nn0re(cfv(chash, c2))
  mpbid(wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cr), wn(wbr(co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cle, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2))), wbr(co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat2), clt, co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)))

blocks.name: nb3grpr
blocks.content: The neighbors of a vertex in a simple graph with three elements are an unordered pair of the other vertices iff all vertices are connected with each other. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nb3grpr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(w3a(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cpr(c1, c3), c2), wcel(cpr(c3, c0), c2)), wral(s0, c4, wrex(s1, c4, wrex(s2, cdif(c4, csn(cv(s1))), wceq(co(c5, cnbgr, cv(s0)), cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cusgr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, ctp(c0, c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c1, c7), wcel(c3, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c3), wne(c1, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)

blocks.name: nb3grpr2
blocks.content: The neighbors of a vertex in a simple graph with three elements are an unordered pair of the other vertices iff all vertices are connected with each other. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: nb3gr2nb
blocks.content: If the neighbors of two vertices in a graph with three elements are an unordered pair of the other vertices, the neighbors of all three vertices are an unordered pair of the other vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 28-Oct-2020.)
